name: Times at the Mansion
description:
Your friend has went inside an abandoned mansion for a movie that he is making, but he hasn't came out ever since and has went missing.

Created by: carlosfruitcup & Qlouk

(Note: This is a demo! If you would like to give some feedback, go to settings (if you're in-game, press ESC) and click on Feedback, it should take you to a google form. If it doesn't here you go!)
